Q_DESC:
Write a program to implement First In First Out.FIFO Page Replacement technique is one of the simplest one to implement amongst other page replacement algorithms. It is a conservative algorithm.

It is a low-overhead algorithm that maintains a queue to keep a track of all the pages in a memory.

When a page needs to be replaced, the page at the FRONT of the Queue will be replaced.

Input:
4
6
5 6 4 1 2 3

4 = No of Frames
6 = No of Pages
Followed by Pages
